visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with each month labeled appropriately. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors for the series and include configurations for chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a zooming feature for the x-axis. The chart's background color is set to a light gray (#f9f9f9), and margins are adjusted for better spacing. The title and axis labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The x-axis labels represent the months of the year, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes the monthly average temperature values, and the series color is set to a custom shade of red (#FF6347). The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart.
